A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It took me a month to get through this pile of crap. I seriously fell asleep the first time I saw it. When I woke up\, it was over and I wondered what I missed. When I went back to the part I could remember\, I got bored a second time. And I decided to not bother with it for a while. The next two weeks I'd go back and try to watch it\, but everything about it was such a disorganised mess that I ended up putting it off for a bit longer. I finally got through it after a month of going back and forth. This film did nothing for the series. I mean\, we could literally skip it altogether and would be much happier we did.
